ygData.subject: A couple questions..
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello everyone. I play a level 4 mage (seemingly the only class on this mailing list) and I have a few questions about spells and such. Sorry for the list, but
ygData.messageBody:
Hello everyone. I play a level 4 mage (seemingly the only class on this
mailing list) and I have a few questions about spells and such. Sorry for the
list, but it's the easiest way to get it across.
1. Since you can only use Bind Affinity at level 12, are you basically stuck
in your home town until then? I find this hard to believe, since warriors
might not be able to cast it, but some people have said this to be true.
2. I started training in piercing, and lately I've seen most fellow Erudites
carrying staffs or clubs. Was this a mistake? Does it even matter latter on,
as you'll be fighting in a group and not using melee weapons?
3. Hey, where's the music?!

That's all. Any help will be greatly appreciated.

Izin
